content: Here's a topic for the CIMI Connectathon currently going on now!
Hi! What are you connecthing? Would have been great to be there :-(
Hi Michael. Cognitive has been kind enough to host meetings to focus on tooling for CIMI. It was advertised on the CIMI distribution list. Bryn will post the GoToMeeting info.

Link to the meeting with Keith:
